text: Everyone has a secret. Mine is that I love sleeping above all. Don’t say this to my boss. :)
When I am told in the morning that I am lazy, I respond: “I’m not lazy, – I’m energy saving!”
Everyone can change the world – just have a great love for what you do every day. And you will see how World loves you back.
A good laugh and a long sleep are the two best cures for anything.
author: Irish Proverb

text: When was the last time you were as honest as Marilyn? “The nicest thing for me is sleep.”
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: A sleep is an opportunity to turn the whole world off and finally listen to the silence deep inside you.
Me: It’s time to wake up. Bed: Please, don’t go yet. Has your bed let you go without entreating you to stay longer?
Tired minds don’t plan well. Sleep first, plan later.
author: Walter Reisch

text: Happiness does not depend on what you have or who you are. It solely relies on what you think.
author: Buddha

text: Only a good night’s sleep can be better than just a sleep.
Important is not only What you do but also How you do it. Be inspired experiencing this day!
No one knows the secret of my beauty and prettiness. It’s simple: I sleep enough. :)
All the best things happen unexpectedly. Take care of yourself to meet everyday challenges with great energy and inspiration!
Good morning! Today is a perfect day to change your life. Try. Reflect. Achieve.
Great roads are paved with everyday baby steps. Which step towards a happy life are you willing to make today?
Sometimes changes show what a lot of things you haven’t seen in yourself yet. Use changes in your life to meet your inner superhero!
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
author: William Blake

text: Never hurry. Take plenty of exercises. Always be cheerful. Take all the sleep you need. You may expect to be well.
author: James Freeman Clarke

text: Sleep is like a Nutella tin: no one tells this but everyone loves it.
Do you agree that a night without dreams is like a cupcake without frosting? ;)
This day is going to be the best day ever.
There is a time for many words, and there is also a time for sleep.
author: Homer

text: It is so great to sleep in glorious and beautiful city/place. I just cannot get over it. :)
If you don't think a small act can make a difference, try going to sleep with a mosquito in the room.
author: Julie Foudy

text: A good sleep needs silence. Silence gives birth to your own answers.
I don’t need to wear a lot of makeup if I sleep well. Be like me – just sleep at night. ;)
Dream big while you sleep, and even bigger when you’re awake.
author: Jared Leto

text: Today I had a nice dream. I woke up and had a breakfast – I want to have energy to turn my dreams into reality! Thank you, Sleep – You inspire me!
You are the best thing that has ever happened to this Planet today. Smile!
